text: Rezwanul Haque Idu Chowdhury (1930-25 May 1994) is a politician from the Thakurgaon District of Bangladesh and a former Member of Parliament of Dinajpur-3 and Thakurgaon-1. ==Career== Haque was elected to parliament from Dinajpur-3 as a Bangladesh Nationalist Party candidate in 1979. He joined the Jatiya Party in 1986 and elected to parliament from Thakurgaon-1 as a Jatiya Party candidate in 1986 and 1988. He was the former Minister of Social Welfare. == Personal life == Chowdhury was married to Sultana Rezwan Chowdhury, daughter of Haji Mohammad Danesh. ==References== Category:Bangladesh Nationalist Party politicians Category:1930 births Category:2nd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:3rd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:4th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:People from Thakurgaon District Category:1994 deaths Category:Date of birth missing
title: Rezwanul Haque
